snippet.title: Get-A-Grip Chip Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Steam Friday, October 16th: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1269590/GetAGrip_Chip/

Get-A-Grip Chip is a platformer with a twist guaranteed to get you (grappling) hooked! When piloting Get-A-Grip Chip you can’t jump, but you can soar through the treacherous depths of a robot assembly factory using your head-mounted grapple! 
Hook onto bolts to launch over pits of molten metal, giant crushers, pools of toxic waste, shifty saws, and high-powered lasers.


#getagripchip
